M103.name: Snake
M103.text: After Snake deals damage: Next time you cast a spell, take one damage

M107.name: Goblin
M107.text: If Goblin lives until end of turn, summon another Goblin

M108.name: Crabula
M108.text: After Crabula attacks, it is reshuffled into the monsters deck

M109.name: Imp
M109.flavorText: Really, the runt of the demon family

M110.name: Ghost
M110.text: Reduce damage dealt to Ghost by 1

M111.name: Zombie
M111.text: When Zombie deals damage, something happens

M112.name: Skeleton
M112.text: As long as Skeleton is on the board, whenever a non-Skeleton is killed, summon a Skeleton

M113.name: Scorpion
M113.text: After Scorpion deals damage, take 1 damage every turn that Scorpion remains on the board

M115.name: Crystal Elemental
M115.text: When Crystal Elemental is killed, it deals 1 damage

M117.name: Dark Fairy
M117.text: When damage would be dealt to Dark Fairy, flip a coin. If it is tails, damage to Dark Fairy is ignored.

M118.name: Poor Trickster
M118.flavorText: Poor like bad, he's actually inherited quite a bit of money.
M118.text: Poor Trickster is immune to all damage the turn he appears

M119.name: Cowardly Commander
M119.flavorText: Oh look, he actually is quivering in his boots
M119.text: Cowardly Commander has +1 attack for every other Level 1 creature on the board

M120.name: Thrall
M120.flavorText: You might say he's enTHRALLed. Right?
M120.text: Thrall has +1 attack if there is also a Level 2 monster on the board

M121.name: Crumbling Golem
M121.flavorText: That's the way the golem crumbles
M121.text: When Crubmling Golem dies, deal 1 damage to the creature to his left

M122.name: Minor Demon
M122.flavorText: Sounds creepier than a Major Demon, if you ask me
M122.text: Has +1/+1 for every other demon on the board

M123.name: Auto-Xbow
M123.flavorText: The latest in death machine technology
M123.text: Auto-Xbow deals 1 damage the turn it enters play

M124.name: Rusty Construct
M124.flavorText: Used to be Shiny New Construct, but time makes fools of us all

M125.name: Falcon
M125.flavorText: Not to be confused with Falcor
M125.text: Falcon has +1 attack if it has attacked more than once

M126.name: Dragonling
M126.text: Fire Belch: Every turn, add a counter to Dragonling. When he has 3 counters, deal 3 damage and remove all tokens

M127.name: Fading Shade
M127.text: Damage to Fading Shade is reduced by 2

M128.name: Toxic Sponge
M128.text: After Toxic Sponge deals damage, take 1 damage per turn until it dies

M129.name: Cloud of Gnats
M129.text: While Cloud of Gnats is on the board, reduce all damage dealt by player by 1

M130.name: Distracting Gnome
M130.text: Whenever Distracting Gnome is dealt damage, it deals its attack damage

M201.name: Harpy
M201.text: Harpy deals damage equal to its attack when it enters play

M202.name: Dueling Aristocrat
M202.text: Dueling Aristocrat ignores the first damage dealt to him

M204.name: Skeletal Knight
M204.flavorText: Well, more like a skeleton that used to be a knight
M204.text: If Skeletal Knight is not the first monster killed this turn, resummon Skeletal Knight at the beginning of the next round

M205.name: Wind Elemental
M205.text: Damage to Wind Elemental is reduced by 2

M207.name: Wizard's Apprentice
M207.flavorText: Not with the broomsticks, but you get the idea
M207.text: Enters with 2 counters on it. Remove a counter each turn. When Wizard's Apprentice has no counters on it, deal 5 damage and add 2 counters to it

M208.name: Goliath Arachnid
M208.text: If Goliath Arachnid was not dealt damage before it attacks, re-learn a level 1 spell

M209.name: Drunken Brawler
M209.text: Flip a coin. If it is heads, Drunken Brawler deals no damage this round

M210.name: Wailing Wight
M210.text: When Wailing Wight enters play, re-learn a level 2 spell

M212.name: Bandit
M212.text: If Bandit is alive at the end of the round, re-learn a random level 1 spell. The level of that card is dealt to you as damage

M213.name: Young Drake
M213.flavorText: Still learning how to burp fire
M213.text: Damage to Young Drake is reduced by 1

M214.name: Giant Leech
M214.text: If Giant Leech deals damage, it gains +2 health

M215.name: Giant Squid
M215.text: If Giant Squid is undamaged at the end of the round, shuffle it back into the monster deck

M216.name: Dark Acolyte
M216.flavorText: A preferred title to Emo Acolyte
M216.text: Add a counter to Dark Acolyte. When Dark Acolyte has 5 counters, deal 8 damage to player and remove all counters

M217.name: Crazed Prophet
M217.flavorText: He's got a big number 9 on his smock
M217.text: Add a counter to Crazed Prophet. When Crazed Prophet has 3 counters, discard your hand and remove all counters

M218.name: Orc
M218.text: Orc has +1 attack for every damage it's taken

M220.name: Phantom
M220.text: Every time Phantom deals damage, destroy another monster and gain +1 attack

M221.name: Cyclops
M221.flavorText: Pink eye is the worst if you're a cyclops

M222.name: Scruffy
M222.flavorText: What nightmare hath torn this company in twain?
M222.text: If Scruffy was not damaged during a round, he naps for a round

M223.name: Shade
M223.flavorText: He gets thrown around a lot

M224.name: Golem
M224.flavorText: He was going after a ring, but he was a few letters off

M225.name: Tangling Vine
M225.text: If Tangling Vine deals damage, re-learn a level 1 spell

M301.name: Vampire
M301.text: Each time Vampire deals damage, it gains 3 health

M302.name: Lich
M302.text: Lich can only be damaged if there are no Level 1 monsters in play

M303.name: Poison Cloud
M303.text: Damage to Poison Cloud is halved. Every turn Poison Cloud is in play, you take 2 damage

M305.name: Griffin
M305.text: Griffin deals damage equal to its attack when it enters play

M306.name: Tar Beast
M306.text: The first time damage is dealt to Tar Beast each turn, it is ignored

M308.name: Slime
M308.flavorText: Makes a lot of gross sounds when it moves
M308.text: When Slime dies, it deals 3 damage to you

M309.name: Adept
M309.flavorText: He's sort of okay, better than an apprentice, anyway
M309.text: Every time Adept deals damage, flip a coin. If it is heads, Adept deals 3 additional damage

M310.name: Goblin King
M310.flavorText: He's not as tough as he looks. But he is as smelly as you'd think
M310.text: If Goblin King is damaged but not killed, summon a 2/1 goblin

M311.name: Assassin
M311.flavorText: What an ass. Twice over, right?
M311.text: Assassin cannot be targeted until after he deals damage

M313.name: Dark Elf
M313.flavorText: Dark refers to his personality. And also his robes. And his eyes...
M313.text: Dark Elf has +2 attack if he's the only Level 3 monster on the board

M314.name: Water Elemental
M314.flavorText: If it were really hot, it would be a steam elemental
M314.text: Damage to Water Elemental is reduced by 2

M315.name: Basilisk
M315.flavorText: Don't worry, you're not a Horcrux
M315.text: If you're damaged by Basilisk, take 1 damage every time you cast a spell until Basilisk dies

M316.name: Animated Armor
M316.text: Animated Armor has damaged reduced by 2

M317.name: Big Snake
M317.text: If you are damaged by Big Snake, the next three times you cast a spell, take one damage

M318.name: Beholder
M318.flavorText: Pick an eye to look at
M318.text: If you are damaged by Beholder,

M320.name: Troll
M320.text: Troll heals 2 damage at the end of every round
